about_the_game:
In the not-too-distant future, Earth became uninhabitable due to a devastating war. Humanity was forced to leave their planet and search for a new home in space. Players take on the role of space travelers who must explore different planets and collect resources to survive in this new world.

The game offers players a wide variety of planets to explore, each with its own unique features and resources. From deserted worlds with rare resources to rich planets with valuable minerals, players must choose where they will build their bases and extract resources.

Players can create their own spaceships and upgrade them to explore new planets and face the dangers of space. They can also build bases on planets to protect themselves from hostile creatures and other players.

Apart from collecting resources, players also have to take care of their needs such as food, water, and oxygen. They can grow plants at their bases or use special technologies to provide themselves with necessary resources.

However, apart from surviving, players can also join alliances and fight for control over resources and territories. The game offers many opportunities for interaction with other players, including trade, cooperation, and competition.



Features of the game:
* A wide selection of planets for exploration;
* The ability to create and improve spaceships;
* Building bases and ensuring security;
* Collecting resources and taking care of needs;
* Interaction with other players.

This game is an exciting journey through space, where players must survive, explore, and interact with the world around them. It offers a unique experience of cosmic survival and the opportunity to create your own path in this new universe.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a realistic atmosphere. Player characters can die through various means, some involving dismemberment or decapitation. Player characters can use fictional medical drugs recklessly.

name: Diamond Hunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel i5 6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel i7 6700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A co-op horror game in which you search for resources to survive and find a galaxy to live in.
